name: GW: Cloud
description:
Help Cloud to protect the land through five different levels.

The evil armies of robots are taking over your world

Fight them using your mystical powers and return the peace

once again.

This game uses JPCT Engine.

Destroy the enemy factories (the grey buildings), pass the cloud through the crystal to gain power then you can throw thunders , dont let the robots reach the crystal, and use the stones heads to defend yourself, just fire them from above.
